channel.title: Rift
channel.description:
go buy it, go play it, ???, profit
i played open beta and loved it, its awesome how rifts can spawn and walk all around the world messin up every town and its up to players to fend them off.
preordered the game, woke up 4:30am this morning to get in the head start opening, fell asleep and its 6am now and my server has queues of 2500. all other servers have 500+ queues too, this is a great game and i wont even bother explaining why, go read about it or check it out your self

item.title: Rift
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

My brother bought it and started playing a few days ago. He enjoys it.

I don’t really know why someone has suggested that it isn’t ‘polished’. The game world and entities in the game look quite good to me.
If it is unbalanced then they’ll have the chance to rectify those problems as time goes on, just like WoW has had the chance.

Read full topic

They’ve grown more user-friendly over time though, and that’s probably one reason more people are starting to play it.

item.title: Rift
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:8, topic:383791”]so in other words, its an mmorpg[/quote]In other words, it is a TYPE of MMORPG, sadly being of the predominant flavour nowadays. Planetside, Ultima Online, Meridian 59, Darkfall Online (no, it is not dead, quite the opposite, it attracts more people all da tiem) and EvE Online are all from other various flavours of MMORPGs.

TLDR: Making the same game over and over again with minor changes is not a nice way to progress an already stagnant and washed up market.

Read full topic

item.title: Rift
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

I tried the closed beta because i was invited (wasn’t interested in the game), and i found it to be yet another WoW-clone, and it didn’t hold my interest for more than an hour.

Read full topic

item.title: Rift
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

Mages are OP, end of discussion. I mean, I had a nechro/stom/demo mage and at level 9 I had around 3 knockback spell, one high-damage electricity spell with no cast time, no cooldown and low-mana cost, the 3 concurrent talents is a stupid idea, it gives way too many abilities and too much to look after.

Rifts happen far too often and give far too much in terms of rewards.

Also this game is IDENTICAL to World of Warcraft in damn near every way.

And I worked this all out in the time it took me to get from 1 -> 9. Bad game not worth the money it costs.

Read full topic

item.title: Rift
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I played the beta, though not a lot.

Found it kinda meh, was not as impressed as I thought I would be given the hype. Seemed very sloppy, despite the good ideas.

May end up playing it though as a few IRL friends are going to.

Read full topic
